content.rendered:
You can do better than a dozen roses for Mother’s Day. This year, show your Mom, wife, or special lady in your life, how much you love and how well you know her. In case you need a few ideas, here are 3 activities that will guarantee the special woman in your life enjoys her day. Don’t forget ~ Mother’s Day is May 8th this year!

Whitewater Rafting
– Take your loved one on an adventure of a lifetime! We have several whitewater trips, ranging from Beginner (Class 3) to Advanced (Class 5). Our three outposts, Idaho Springs, Granite, and Kremmling offer trips for every experience and adrenaline level.

Aerial Adventure
– Not interested in rafting? Check out our zipline courses. Our first zipline course is located in Idaho Springs, approximately 45 minutes from Denver, Colorado. This aerial adventure includes six zip lines and several extra options and amenities such as the 50 foot free fall, surf zip, dual race line, the jungle bridge, and last but not least, the bridge of doom! The second course is located near Buena Vista, roughly a 2.5 hour drive from Denver and a beautiful hour drive from Breckenridge. This course has seven lines the span across 44 acres of the Arkansas River Valley. The Mountaintop Adventure has several additional features including the infamous swinging log bridge, the hanging log staircase and a 50-foot free fall option!

Georgetown Train Ride
– Georgetown, Colorado is located off I-70, about an hour from Denver. The train travels 3.1 miles around 2 loops and four different bridges, providing ample opportunities to take in the gorgeous Colorado scenery.

Gift Card
– Not sure which activity would be best for the special day? Purchasea gift card online or with one of our adventure experts at 877 – RAFTING.

Mother’s Day is a special day devoted to celebrating all of the wonderful women in your life. The point isn’t how much you spend, but how much thought you put into making her feel special. Do not wait to book this amazing adventure!
